Solver
Interface HDRSolverUpdateListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
Controller
public interface HDRSolverUpdateListener

Interface which is used to inform the caller asynchronously of the progress of the execution.

Author:
sebastianzillessen

Method Summary
 void errorOccured(java.lang.String message, HDRResult lastResult)
          this method is going to be called if some errors occured in the solver.
 void updateState(int progress, HDRResult hdrResult)
          method is called from the IHDRSolver whenever a new temp. result is available or when the process is finished.
 

Method Detail

errorOccured

void errorOccured(java.lang.String message,
                  HDRResult lastResult)
this method is going to be called if some errors occured in the solver. If available the last calculated result will be returned.

Parameters:
message - Error message
lastResult - last result if one is available (null otherwise)

updateState

void updateState(int progress,
                 HDRResult hdrResult)
method is called from the IHDRSolver whenever a new temp. result is available or when the process is finished.

Parameters:
progress - progress in percent. 100% = finished
hdrResult - temporary (or final) HDR result.
